description: Returns existing resource operation requests. This includes requests of all status types. For more information, see Listing active resource operation requests in the Amazon Web Services Cloud Control API User Guide.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to be returned with a single call. If the number of available results exceeds this maximum, the response includes a NextToken value that you can assign to the NextToken request parameter to get the next set of results. The default is 20.

parameters.name: ResourceRequestStatusFilter
parameters.description: The filter criteria to apply to the requests returned. Operations (list) --- The operation types to include in the filter. (string) --- OperationStatuses (list) --- The operation statuses to include in the filter. PENDING: The operation has been requested, but not yet initiated. IN_PROGRESS: The operation is in progress. SUCCESS: The operation completed. FAILED: The operation failed. CANCEL_IN_PROGRESS: The operation is in the process of being canceled. CANCEL_COMPLETE: The operation has been canceled. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Operations
nested_params.description: The operation types to include in the filter.

nested_params.name: OperationStatuses
nested_params.description: The operation statuses to include in the filter.

nested_items.name: ResourceRequestStatusSummaries
nested_items.description: The requests that match the specified filter criteria.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource type used in the operation.

nested_items.name: Identifier
nested_items.description: The primary identifier for the resource.

nested_items.name: RequestToken
nested_items.description: The unique token representing this resource operation request.

nested_items.name: HooksRequestToken
nested_items.description: The unique token representing the Hooks operation for the request.

nested_items.name: OperationStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the resource operation request.
PENDING: The resource operation hasn't yet started.
IN_PROGRESS: The resource operation is currently in progress.
SUCCESS: The resource operation has successfully completed.
FAILED: The resource operation has failed. Refer to the error code and status message for more information.
CANCEL_IN_PROGRESS: The resource operation is in the process of being canceled.
CANCEL_COMPLETE: The resource operation has been canceled.

nested_items.name: EventTime
nested_items.description: When the resource operation request was initiated.

nested_items.name: ResourceModel
nested_items.description: A JSON string containing the resource model, consisting of each resource property and its current value.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: Any message explaining the current status.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: For requests with a status of FAILED, the associated error code.

nested_items.name: RetryAfter
nested_items.description: When to next request the status of this resource operation request.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the request doesn't return all of the remaining results, NextToken is set to a token. To retrieve the next set of results, call ListResources again and assign that token to the request object's NextToken parameter. If the request returns all results, NextToken is set to null.
